Description: Accounting software in the cloud for self-employed professionals and their teams.
Name: Freshbooks Classic

Methods.Name: List Clients
Methods.Description: Returns a list of client summaries in order of descending client_id.

Methods.Name: List Updated Clients
Methods.Description: Returns a list of clients added or updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Client
Methods.Description: Return the client details associated with the given Client ID.

Methods.Name: List Invoices
Methods.Description: Returns a list of invoice summaries. Results are ordered by descending Invoice ID.

Methods.Name: List Updated Invoices
Methods.Description: Returns a list of invoices added or updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Invoice
Methods.Description: Return the complete invoice details associated with the given Invoice ID.
